price: (Rasûlüm!) Şayet dileseydik, elbet her ülkeye bir uyarıcı (peygamber) gönderirdik.(Fakat evrensel uyarıcılık görevini sana verdik, seni bütün insanlığa peygamber olarak gönderdik.)
arabic: وَلَوۡ شِئۡنَا لَبَعَثۡنَا فِي كُلِّ قَرۡيَةٖ نَّذِيرٗا

version.title: Turkish Translation - Ali Ozek
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by a group of scholars. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walaw shi'nā labaʿathnā fī kulli qaryatin nadhīran
